channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flashing Sign for School not working, 26th March
item.description:
Flashing Sign to show 20mph limit during school times is currently not operating.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 44, Hall Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter on side of slip road and fly tipping, 26th March
item.description:
Lots of litter along the slip road on junction 10 on the M5. There is also fly tipping off the side of the slip road which is adjoining to a field. I’ve noticed this for a few months now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
